name: nbind
description: Magical headers that make your C++ library accessible from JavaScript

scripts.lint: node src/checkver.js lt 10.0.0 || (tslint --type-check -c src/tslint.json -p src/tsconfig.json && tslint --type-check -c src/tslint.json -p src/em/tsconfig.json)
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && tsc -p src/em && tsc -p src && (node src/checkver.js lt 0.12.0 || cbuild -x -v -s dist/bundle/em/em-api.js -o dist/em-api.js)
scripts.test-asm: npm run config-test && cd test/em && node-gyp rebuild --asmjs=1 && node ../../bin/ndts --no-shim . > ../testlib.d.ts && tsc -p .. && node --expose-gc ../../node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js
scripts.test: npm run config-test && cd test/v8 && node-gyp rebuild && node ../../bin/ndts --no-shim . > ../testlib.d.ts && tsc -p .. && node --expose-gc ../../node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js

author: Juha JÃ¤rvi
